title: The Ghost Who Loved Diamonds
description: Everything is right on track for Danielle as she prepares for the grand opening of her bed and breakfast. All that changes when her cousin, Cheryl, shows up to claim her share of the inheritance—housemate Lily figures out there is a ghost in the house—and the million dollar necklace goes missing. There is blood on someone’s hands and if Danielle isn’t careful she’ll be moving from Marlow House to the Big House.
author: Bobbi Holmes
